title: test_nifti1.test_nifti on buildbots: Failed to get dataset metadata (nifti1): 'int' object has no attribute 'item'
body:
now that buildbots seems to be ok, and everyone knows how to knock to get access to the buildbot logs:
```
======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.metadata.parsers.tests.test_nifti1.test_nifti
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):

    self.test(*self.arg)

    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/buildbot/datalad-tests-docker-dl-nd16_04/build/datalad/metadata/parsers/tests/test_nifti1.py", line 36, in test_nifti
    res = ds.aggregate_metadata()
  File "/home/buildbot/datalad-tests-docker-dl-nd16_04/build/venv-ci/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/wrapt/wrappers.py", line 562, in __call__
    args, kwargs)
  File "/home/buildbot/datalad-tests-docker-dl-nd16_04/build/datalad/distribution/dataset.py", line 437, in apply_func
    return f(**kwargs)
  File "/home/buildbot/datalad-tests-docker-dl-nd16_04/build/venv-ci/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/wrapt/wrappers.py", line 523, in __call__
    args, kwargs)
  File "/home/buildbot/datalad-tests-docker-dl-nd16_04/build/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 437, in eval_func
    return return_func(generator_func)(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/buildbot/datalad-tests-docker-dl-nd16_04/build/venv-ci/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/wrapt/wrappers.py", line 523, in __call__
    args, kwargs)
  File "/home/buildbot/datalad-tests-docker-dl-nd16_04/build/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 425, in return_func
    results = list(results)
  File "/home/buildbot/datalad-tests-docker-dl-nd16_04/build/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 413, in generator_func
    msg="Command did not complete successfully")
IncompleteResultsError: Command did not complete successfully [{'action': 'aggregate_metadata', 'path': '/tmp/datalad_temp_test_nifti0qLhjn', 'status': 'error', 'message': 'Metadata extraction failed (see previous error message)'}]
```
